title: The default value set in a list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description:
When modifying the default value of a list box in a report parameter, the previously set default value is lost.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter configuration
2. Set a default value for a list box parameter
3. Modify the default value
4. Save the changes

OB:
The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
